text:
Tish - Things - City - Nashville - Family

(Excerpt) Read more at: E! Online

Wake Up To Breaking News! SUBMIT

Out of all the improvements, Tish explained Miley's barn was by far the most difficult undertaking."When my husband suggested redoing it, I was like, there is no way!" Tish said. "The floors were dirt; there was no flooring at all; and I thought the contractors were going to say we had to tear it down. But we ran the plumbing and we ran the electrical."Tish also said that things became even more difficult when the city of Nashville then told the family that any property with electrical and plumbing would need to be attached to the main...
title: Tish and Billy Ray Cyrus Build Miley Cyrus a ''Spunky'' Guest Barn Fit for a Hippie Queen
